content: Hi there ! I'm a Maths student hoping to do a summer project formalizing some maths !
Hi Paul! In what year are you, now?
I'm currently a second year student (I study in Britain, but have been spending quite a lot of time at home in France because of the lockdowns)
Ah, I see. So you're looking for a British summer project!
Ideally ! I'm applying for something with my university at the minute !
Hello, I'm now here. I am interested in Lean meetings here or nearby cities.
Does Bordeaux count as nearby? we have an informal group (not very active) in the CS lab here.

Rida Hamadani said:

Hello, I'm now here. I am interested in Lean meetings here or nearby cities.

Congratulations
That's great! Yes I can visit Bordeaux whenever you meet, but I will need a week or two to settle down here first.
Hello les Palois et Bordelais. I have lived 5 years in Pau, and ~15 years in Caud√©ran/Pessac. I'm in the USA at the time though, but I visit Bordeaux every couple years.
